display_name: SuperScience Morningness and Eveningness Scale (SSMES): Imagine school is cancelled!  You can get up whenever you want to.  When would you get out of bed?  Between:
description:
Item from Sleep for Science Questionnaire SuperScience Morningness and Eveningness Scale. [Carskadon MA et al., 1993 (PubMed ID: 8506460)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/8506460/)

[Search for all SuperScience Morningness and Eveningness Scale variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=ssmes)

Original text: Please check the single best answer to every question based on your body's "feeling best" times during the most recent two weeks.
